name: Fish and Birds: Surf Wars
description:
Fish And Birds: Basic Tapping Surfing is an endless runner that will surprise you.

You'll enjoy surfing the waves to infinity and find the most dangerous pigeons and evil birds that try to throw you off the surfboard.

We are pleased to introduce you to Baroon Golden Fingers, he is a fish sailing the ocean with a surf board rocket, yeah, it's so crazy. You should meet this peculiar animal that comes from tropical seas. It's really friendly and fun.

Be careful that the tide rises and falls, but you can make Baroon a great surfer with the basic controls of tapping on the screen, you can help him to dodge all the obstacles and discover worlds without limit.

Not everything is so easy, the army of pigeons is very well trained and you need help from the wonderful pets that will help you. Ignus is a ghost who comes from the other side, he will revive you When you fell.

Gagnet is a greedy cash magnet that also wanted to discover the tropical Temple of Pigeons, but in the end he  wasn't chosen.

Gentle is a Victorian hat that you can get double amount of cash! Yes it's incredible and really wonderful.

You can collect all the pets!!

Are you ready?

In Potoo Games we are two passionate young developers who belong to the incubator program of Demium Games.

We are so excited to make our dreams of developing videogames and we are more than glad that you are giving us your support by reading this, and we hope you could go ahead and play our game and tell us your opinion about it.

CREDITS

Game Design and Programming: Diego Díaz

Art 2D: Frank Ruocco
